Text:
How can I insert cyrillic text in torrent description?  All russian letters become corrupted. :(

So, read description in english :)

---------------------------------------------
Supported OS:
Win 95 OSR2
Win 98
Win ME
Win XP

Serial# : 1112-1111111

Installer will fail to read two files, just ignore error messages and continue - all will be OK.
---------------------------------------------
